actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on: (1) 1-hydroxy-6-docosyloxy-2-naphthalenecarboxylic acid (odec); (2) 1-hydroxy-6-octadecyloxy-2-naphthalenecarboxylic acid (londec); and (3) 7-(hexadecylsulfonylamino)-1H-indole (sulfoxan).

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.
